name: Hypnotic Concoction
descrip: A small bottle filled with concealed slumber magic that can be thrown.
statusOutcome: {AttackerName} throws a bottle of magic that breaks on impact underneath {TargetYouOrMonsterName} and accidently breathes in the magical mist that was released!
statusMiss: {TargetName} resists the magical mist that entered his lungs and powers through the concocted magic. {AttackerYouOrMonsterName} eye twitching as if {TargetName} had pressed a nerve!
